dct_title_s: Cape of Good Hope and Orange Free State. Philipstown
dct_description_sm: Topographical map indicating Philipstown and other villages, roads, railways, rivers, mountains and other features in the area surrounding Philipstown.
Relief shown by contours, form lines and spot heights.
Map folds into an outer cover.
Ancillary map: Lemoenfontein Drift (scale 1 in. to 0.5 miles).
Descriptive text on nature of country, rivers, roads, railways, transport, water, fuel, supplies and towns.
dct_publisher_sm: Drawn and printed at the War Office
dct_rights_sm: Image courtesy University of Cape Town Libraries, Special Collections: Maps scanned under the William and Yvonne Jacobson Digital Africana Program at UCT. If you have questions, please contact David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Property rights reside with the repository. Copyright (c) Stanford University. All Rights Reserved.
